articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT buildspace
🚨 FINAL CALL - 4 hours 20 minutes left to get your applications in for Nights & Weekends! 🚨
see u soon ✨
buildspace: Introducing — Nights and Weekends 🌙
A new way for you to build shit you're passionate about alongside incredible builders.
Join 100 others over six weeks to ship or sink your web3 project: pick an idea, build every week, get roasted, iterate.
 https://buildspace.so/nights-weekends
articles.title: RT buildspace: 🚨 FINAL CALL - 4 hours 20 minutes left to get your applications in for Nights & Weekends! 🚨 see u soon ✨

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT ropats16 | (🧱, 🚀) ᵍᵐ
LFG!! 🚀🔥 We ended up deploying to @ArweaveTeam’s permaweb 2 diff ways. I used @TexturyOrg’s arkb CLI . Learning and debugging with @pbillingsby_eth has been super fun!!
Y’all in for a treat with 2 articles about deploying to permaweb on the way  
Also more alpha soon 👀
pbillingsby.eth: Just deployed a @nextjs app to @ArweaveTeam permaweb using @SpheronHQ. For what it is, it was relatively simple. I plan on writing about the experience soon, but couldn't contain my excitement when it finally worked. @ropats16 we're in business 👀
 https://k4om6tezg6wwssxxugf26kasrs2kccwjlnjvsubqddwibnq.arweave.net/Vx-z-P_TJk3rW-lK96GLrygSjLShCslbU1lQMBjsgLY

articles.description:
RT nader dabit (🧱, 🚀) | sha.eth | Graph Day 2022
I just released a new video: Full Stack Web3 with Lens Protocol, Next.js, & GraphQL - Building a Social Media App! 🪐✨
Includes
- Lens overview
- Queries (recommended profiles + profile view)
- Transactions (follow users)
- Routing
- Example codebases https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LcxOdWWL8xs

articles.description:
RT Chris Brummer
I'm delighted to release a new white paper with @RSSH273, associate General Counsel of @paradigm on "Legal Wrappers and DAOs."
